column4: how to change the default port for x-chat-gnome from 6667 to 8001?
how to change the default port for x-chat-gnome from 6667 to 8001?

XChat-GNOME users can change this by going to Edit -> Preferences. Then select Networks on the side. Double-click on Ubuntu Servers on the right, click the servers tab, and then change irc.ubuntu.com to irc.ubuntu.com/8001.
